hero.title: Building Dreams (and Terrible Jokes) in Western NC
hero.description: Fafula Projects is a small, detail-focused construction company specializing in residential siding, decking, exterior trim, and custom carpentry. We partner with homeowners and builders to solve problems on site, keep schedules moving, and leave every job cleaner than we found it.
hero.imageAlt: Fafula Projects crew working on a home exterior

logos.title: Trusted by Homeowners and Builders Across Western NC
logos.description: We work with local homeowners and partner with builders who need a reliable siding, decking, and trim crew.

features.title: What Fafula Projects Can Handle for You
features.description: From siding and decks to trim and small custom builds, we focus on clean details, clear communication, and solving the little problems before they become big ones.

items.title: Siding & Exterior Details
items.description: Fiber cement, LP, or specialty products – installed with clean lines, proper flashing, and the little trim details that make a house look finished.

items.title: Decks & Outdoor Spaces
items.description: Composite and wood decks, stairs, and railings. We focus on structure, layout, and details so your deck feels solid and looks sharp.

items.title: Interior & Exterior Trim
items.description: Interior casing, baseboard, feature walls, and exterior fascia/soffit details that tie the whole project together.

items.title: Builder Partnerships
items.description: We regularly partner with builders who need a reliable crew for siding, decks, and punch-list style projects on single-family homes.

testimonials.title: What Our Clients Are Saying
testimonials.description: Hear from our clients about their experiences working with Nuxt and Netlify.

items.quote: We recently had a bathroom leak that ruined our wood floor and subflooring. Fafula Projects came to our rescue—quick to respond, professional, skillful, and a pleasure to work with. Their attention to detail is meticulous, and our bathroom is once again good as new. Highly recommend them for any remodel or new construction projects.

I recently worked with Fafula Projects on my home building project—from trim to installing doors—and I’m thrilled with the results. Their precision and commitment to quality are exceptional. They communicated clearly throughout the process and made everything smooth and enjoyable. Highly recommend for anyone wanting a home built with care and excellence.

We hired Fafula Projects to repair damage to our tongue-and-groove screen porch ceiling after hurricane Helene. They beautifully matched and replaced boards, repaired scratches, and made the ceiling look brand new. Easy to work with and very responsive. Highly recommend.

An excellent company! I contacted them for siding repairs after hurricane Helene, and they also handled extensive tree cleanup. Adolph is top-notch—thorough, professional, and focused on doing the job right. They made sure everything was clean and checked repeatedly that I was satisfied. Honest, skilled, and highly recommended.

Fafula Projects is a pleasure to work with. Their team is professional, quality-oriented, and always helpful. They deliver excellent work on time and within budget. I look forward to partnering with them on future projects.

cta.title: Ready to talk about your next project?
cta.description: Whether you’re a homeowner or a builder, we can help with siding, decks, trim, and small exterior projects around Western North Carolina. We primarily serve Asheville, Hendersonville, Fletcher, Arden, Flat Rock, and nearby communities in the greater Western NC area. Contact us and tell us a bit about your project and we’ll follow up with next steps.
